name: Houston, We Have Spinach!
description: Design and build rockets, fuel them with food and explore a galaxy filled with strange planets.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP SP+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1+,8,10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 300 MB available space
